creator: miki@mikele.no-ip.org
text:
HttpServletRequest.getParameter always parse url as ISO-8859-1
if you use a url like http://localhost:8080/test/servlet/test?field=%C3%A0
request.getParameter("field") will return Ã (%E0)

Sample servlet available here:
https://mikele.no-ip.org/bug/CharTester.java.txt

Make sure URIEncoding="UTF-8" is part of your connector declaration.

Reopen if that isn't the case.
creator: funkman@joedog.org
